title: Clínica
cleaned_text: Como CRO líder desde hace más de 20 años, QualitecFarma® participa en el desarrollo de medicamentos desde las etapas más tempranas hasta la fase de mercado. Los ensayos clínicos, la inteligencia regulatoria y la farmacovigilancia son el soporte para llevar los tratamientos a los pacientes. We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your "Accept All", consent to the ALL cookies. However, you may visit "Cookie Settings" to This cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.
